com.google.appinventor.client.editor.simple.palette
Interface SimplePalettePanel

All Known Implementing Classes:
YoungAndroidPalettePanel
public interface SimplePalettePanel

An interface that a palette can implement in order to support showing Simple components which can be dropped onto a visual designer panel.

Author:
lizlooney@google.com (Liz Looney)

Method Summary
 void configureComponent(MockComponent mockComponent)
          Configure a mock component.
 void loadComponents(DropTargetProvider dropTargetProvider)
          Loads all components to be shown on the palette.
